```{r}
# Load the package
library(hexSticker)

# Generate hex sticker
sticker(
  subplot = "SeroTrackR_image.png",        # your image
  package = "SeroTrackR",        # your package name
  p_size = 30,                   # font size for the package name
  p_color = "#3E3E3E",           # dark grey text
  p_family = "Aller",            # nice readable font (optional)
  s_x = 1,                       # x position of the image
  s_y = 0.8,                     # y position
  s_width = 0.5,                 # scale image size
  s_height = 0.5,
  h_fill = "#FFFFFF",            # hex background color
  h_color = "#6A1B9A",           # border color (purple tone)
  dpi = 600,
  filename = "SeroTrackR_sticker.png"  # output file
)

```
